4300200.name: UFOre: Space Idle
4300200.description:
Welcome to the Most Profitable Operation in the Galaxy!

You possess a high-tech UFO, and your mission is crystal clear: Vacuum everything in sight!

This game combines classic idle (clicker) and resource management mechanics with a delightful space atmosphere. Step into the cockpit, detect and collect valuable minerals on the surface, and manage your inventory to multiply your wealth. Whether you actively hunt for minerals at your screen or upgrade your systems and lean back; your space empire will continue to grow every second.

ğŸ® Gameplay Features

ğŸ›¸ Full Control from the Cockpit You are not an ordinary miner. Step into the cockpit of your own flying saucer and manage the operation from the inside. Scan the planet surface with an isometric perspective, detect minerals, and control your UFO to start gathering resources.

ğŸ’ Collect, Filter, and Manage Not every stone is valuable. Use the game's strategic filtering system to ignore worthless stones and focus only on the most profitable ores. While collecting Copper, Gold, and other valuable resources, you must also account for the rocket's travel time to Earth and manage your storage capacity wisely.

ğŸ­ Refinery and Processing Gathering raw ore is just the beginning. Process the ores you collect in refineries to turn them into pure value. The more efficiently you set up your production line, the faster your earnings will increase.

ğŸš€ Advanced Upgrade System You can strengthen every part of the system with the money you earn:

  • UFO: Increase its speed, cargo capacity, and vacuum suction power.

  • Rocket & Launchpad: Upgrade your ramp to reach more distant planets and discover new mineral deposits.

âœ¨ Atmosphere and Automation

  • Low-Poly Visuals: A peaceful space environment designed with eye-pleasing, stylized, and colorful graphics.

  • Offline Earnings: Your systems continue to work even when you are not in the game. Enjoy the satisfaction of returning to full depots.
